sourcesContent: function t(t={skipFirst:!1}){return e=>e.addInitializer((e=>new s(e,t)))}class s{constructor(t,s={skipFirst:!1}){this.host=t,this.skipFirst=!1,this.host.addController(this),this.skipFirst=!!s.skipFirst,this.resizeElement=s.element?s.element:this.host}async hostConnected(){await this.host.updateComplete,this.observer=new ResizeObserver((t=>{window.requestAnimationFrame((()=>{this.skipFirst?this.skipFirst=!1:(this.host.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent("cdsResizeChange",{detail:t[0].contentRect})),this.host.requestUpdate())}))})),this.observer.observe(this.resizeElement)}hostDisconnected(){this.observer?.disconnect()}}export{s as ResponsiveController,t as responsive};
